buildup.text: Chain-of-thought (CoT) prompts the model to show intermediate reasoning.

discovery.text: CoT works because it forces the model to allocate tokens to reasoning, not just answers.

twist.text: CoT can hurt on simple tasksâ€”extra reasoning steps add cost and latency for no gain.

climax.text: Use CoT for math, logic, and multi-step tasks. Skip it for lookup and classification.

punchline.text: Thinking out loud works for AI too.
